attachments.title: Bill Withers & Grover Washington Jr. - Just The Two Of Us (Plo.berger Edit) by Plo.berger
attachments.text:
My take on this timeless classic because I wanted to be able to play it in my DJ sets.

Written by  Bill Withers, William Salter and Ralph MacDonald, performed by Bill Withers and Grover Washington Jr.

Samples used:
Just The Two of Us (Cover) by Hannah Cho - 
Just the two of us on instrumental electric piano (Korg SV-1) by Julien Apelian - 
Grover Washington - Just a Two of Us by jazzijazzful - 

Cheers
